name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today is the seventh day after the death of little boy Hangping. On the 93rd anniversary of the September 18th Incident, he was attacked with a knife outside a Japanese school in Shenzhen. The school bus guide Hu Youping stepped forward and was seriously injured by the assailant. He also unfortunately passed away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, many netizens in Zhoucun District, Zibo, Shandong Province posted videos saying that they felt sore throats, coughed, and had difficulty breathing due to unknown gases. On the 25th, the Zhoucun District Emergency Management Bureau responded that it was tear gas dropped by the army during training, which had no effect on the human body and had now dissipated, and the air had returned to normal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, during morning exercises at Xiadu School in Yuzhou, Henan, a boy stood outside the window of the fourth floor of the school building and seemed to be about to jump off the building. The situation was very dangerous. A female teacher filmed the video and called the police, but was scolded by a male teacher: "Don't call the police."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 25 (Release), Datong, Shanxi. Recently, a female student from Datong University in Shanxi Province purchased 12 yuan of jujube online and asked for a refund instead of a return, saying that the outer packaging bag was wrinkled. After being rejected by the merchant, she insulted the customer service for an hour. After the staff preserved the evidence and contacted the school to no avail, they had no choice but to send a video to ask for an explanation. The reporter contacted the school staff, who said that the matter is currently being handled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 25, Beijing. The publisher of Democracy and Legal System has owed wages for many years and has not paid pensions. Three station chiefs went to the door of the State Administration of Press and Publication to demand their wages. According to insiders, they are Liu Zhiyan, station chief in Heilongjiang, Luo Zongming, station chief in Guangxi, and Li Qing, station chief in Hunan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, the owners' committee of Jinze Building in Tianhe District, Guangzhou City, was scheduled to count the votes at 7:30 p.m. on September 24. At 7 p.m., while the ballot box of the owners' meeting was being moved to the counting location, it was suddenly and violently snatched away by a man in black (suspected to be assigned by the property management). The female owner was attacked and fell to the ground, "hitting her head against a pillar, breaking her teeth and having a headache", and was rushed to the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 25, senior high school students from Peixian Middle School in Jiangsu Province protested against the school's ban on senior high school students from participating in sports games. The students gathered in front of the teacher's office that night and shouted "Give me back the sports games."
The office director finally compromised, but threatened the students: "You won, but you will lose more."
The students said: "We lost more oppression, but we got rest and the freedom and light that belong to us in the future!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen submission: In Jinhua Tea City Community, Dezhou City, Shandong Province, on July 10 this year, in order to clear the land, the developer forcibly demolished the guard booths on the public land at the north and south gates of the community (resulting in only one guard booth now, and many more idle people inside the community, which has dramatically increased the risk of property safety and personal safety of residents). After the residents found that the booths were demolished, they stopped the trucks transporting construction machinery and refused to let them leave. Later, the police came and "pointed at the residents" and yelled and scolded them. A resident posted the video at that time on Douyin (without exaggeration or any narration), which attracted the attention of netizens and was played a lot. When the video reached 10,000 views, the police came to ask for the video to be deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, villagers in Shitun Village, Xiaotun Town, Ruzhou City, Pingdingshan City, Henan Province, protested against underground coal mining that caused ground collapse and endangered houses, and demanded an end to the mining of the Pingmei Chaochuan Coal Mine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Council issued an opinion on implementing an employment-first strategy to promote high-quality and full employment. The opinion proposed to increase the proportion of labor remuneration in the primary distribution and strengthen macro-guidance on the distribution of enterprise wage income.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, according to the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission’s Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group stationed at the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council and the Tianjin Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision, Lu Jin, former Party Secretary and Chairman of China National Gold Group Corporation, was suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and is currently under investigation. According to the announcement of China National Gold on August 23, just one month ago, Lu Jin resigned from the positions of Chairman, Director, Chairman and Member of the Board’s Strategic Committee for personal reasons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/xFqU5350gT

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 26, the state-owned enterprise China Agricultural Federation's agricultural wholesale market project "Smart Cloud Mall" in Jingzhou City was left unfinished. Since 2021, three years have passed since the project was built, and it has not been completed. The house will not be delivered within the agreed period, and no interest or liquidated damages will be paid. More than a thousand owners have complained through various channels and petitioned for their rights to no avail, demanding the refund of their prepayments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/1Bfri4eyUT

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 25, China's Ministry of Commerce urged the United States to abandon proposed rules restricting Chinese automotive software and hardware, saying it would take "necessary measures" to safeguard the rights and interests of domestic companies.
The Ministry of Commerce said China firmly opposes the restrictions, calling them protectionist practices without factual basis and violating the principles of market economy and fair competition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, the Ministry of Finance and the Ministry of Civil Affairs announced that they would provide living subsidies to vulnerable groups such as the extremely poor and orphans before the National Day holiday next week, but no specific details have been disclosed. The two departments asked local governments to ensure that the relief funds were delivered to the recipients before the National Day holiday, and to promptly convey "the care and concern of the Party and the government for the people in need."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, China launched an intercontinental ballistic missile into the Pacific Ocean, its first ICBM launch in 44 years. The test was Beijing's first major missile launch since it conducted two hypersonic weapons tests in the summer of 2021.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, the Financial Times reported that the FBI is investigating whether a Silicon Valley venture capital firm called Hone Capital leaked secrets to China and whether it obtained technical, financial or customer information about start-ups for its Beijing-based owners or Chinese authorities. Hone Capital was founded in 2015 with initial capital from the Chinese private equity group CSC, one of the most active early investors in Silicon Valley. Former executives Veronica Wu and Purvi Gandhi accused Hone's Chinese shareholders in public court documents of providing them with incentives to invest in specific technologies with "critical intellectual property rights."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Affected by the rainfall, as of September 24, 69 townships in Shangqiu, Henan Province were affected, and the affected population exceeded 430,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China's Guangdong Province has recently seen a large-scale dengue fever outbreak, with Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Foshan and other places reporting nearly 1,000 cases within a week, showing regional point-like outbreak characteristics. The epidemic began to heat up in August and spread further in September. Hong Kong has recorded 12 imported cases, and Taiwan's New Taipei City has also seen 7 local cluster cases. The international medical journal The Lancet pointed out that 2024 may be the worst year for dengue fever in the world's recorded history, and warned that climate change may lead to a wider spread of dengue fever.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted on Xiaohongshu that "I am almost starving to death in Zhengzhou." The netizen shared his experience. He submitted more than 40 resumes and only got a job as a medical representative with a basic salary of 3,500 yuan. After working for four months, the boss did not even pay his salary. He called the 12333 labor assistance hotline and was told that the internship agreement could not be managed. The netizen went to interview for many jobs, including tea artist, subway security inspector, clerk, human resources, e-commerce, customer service, front desk, new media operation and other positions. He was either kicked out after the unpaid trial period, or was deceived, or did some jobs with extremely low pay and long working hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, there was judicial progress in the gymnasium collapse accident at the 34th Middle School in Qiqihar City, Heilongjiang Province, which caused 11 deaths and 7 injuries. The indictment of the Longjiang County Procuratorate showed that Qu Wenxun, the then district head of Longsha District where the school is located, was charged with bribery and embezzlement. Wu Kangyan, the former full-time secretary of the school, and 13 project personnel were charged with dereliction of duty by state-owned institutions, major responsibility accidents, bribery, collusion in bidding, and false VAT invoices for different behaviors in the gymnasium maintenance project and the bidding and construction of the new auxiliary complex project, as well as past behaviors. Some of them were suspected of only one crime, while others were charged with two or three crimes.
